comment: Ridiculously hard tests and outrageous work load, especially in lab.  Very nice and tries to help, but the class is still extremely difficult due to the excessive number of assignments.

She is by far the worst teacher I have ever had.  She made my life miserable for the semester that I had her.  She will make you hate chemistry, science, and life.  She has little concern for how you're doing in the class and replies to your constructive comments with more homework, longer labs and harder tests. Absolutely horrible.

Ok, first of all Chemistry is not an easy course, if you are wanting easy classes then leave the college of Science. This professor is very helpful offer TONS of extra credit and is very willing to help you. ALEKS takes a lot of time, but will help SAVE your grade. ALEKS brings PRACTICE. Overall, if you got to have CHEM 1212 Bromfield-Lee is great!

i heard bad things about her but I thought she was the best professor Ive had so far for science classes. I dont know how she is as a lecture professor but she was an amazing lab prof. She is really clear about what she is looking for. She has templates.She helps understand what is occurring in each experiment. I would love to take her again.

Her class is hard, and ALEKS is very time consuming. Great part is she gives tons of extra credit which you should do. She gives surveys which drop a hwk grade if you do them. If you take this class stay on ALEKS every day to get the homework points and meet with her, she is very sweet, and willing to help if you visit her.

Terrible. First off, she makes you do this program called Aleks, and it takes up SO much time. She goes by the examples fast, and her test are hard. I did well in 1211, but I do not understand anything in 1212.

Dr. Bromfield is a great professor. Her tests are hard, but if you do the study guides, read the book, and go to lectures, you will be fine. She gives ridiculous amounts of extra credit and is always willing to help in her office after class. My only problem is she doesn't prepare you for the final very well.

Loved this professor! Dr. Lee made my organic lab so enjoyable and made me want to come to lab. Despite this being a summer session, I really feel like I learned a lot of useful technique from her. Out of all the lab professors I have had, by the far the best!!

Professor Lee is by far the worst instructor i have ever had. She constantly makes mistakes during problems, and her notes make absolutely no sense. This class made me hate chemistry, which i thought could never happen. She does give a lot of extra credit on homework but i also had to spend much of my time teaching myself the material.

She was a terrible teacher. I love chemistry and she ruined it for me. I have never failed a class, not to mention a science class, until I had her. She makes many mistakes on her problems in class and students often correct her. I would never take her again and she should be avoided.

Lectures are uninformative because she makes a lot of mistakes, that WILL confuse you.Chemistry doesn't come natural to me, so this professor is not someone you want to take unless you like feeling lost in class. Her tests are 14 MC and a free response on the back, but they are pretty difficult -_-Overall she is pretty much all over the place.

she is a nice teacher but... she can not teach without making mistakes, most of her notes are not in the test so you must study on your own. i got a high B in 1211 but failed 2 of 1st 3 tests b/c I listened to what she said... AVOID at all costs!!

She means well but she is an AWFUL professor. I made an A in Chem 1211 and she cant do one example without making several important mistakes. She has no idea how to teach this subject and she rushes through everything to avoid having people ask questions
Horrible professor, would make several mistakes while trying to teach a problem. Hard tests as well. Made an A in chem 1211, and made a C in here.

Absolutely wonderful teacher. Cares about the students and is always more than willing to go out of her way to make time for one on one discussions. Tests were difficult, but comparable to any chemistry professor's test. I absolutely loved her! (:
